name: cron-task
description: Describes cron jobs that run code or a script to completion.

parameters.usage: Specify the labels in the workload
parameters.name: labels

parameters.usage: Specify the annotations in the workload
parameters.name: annotations

parameters.usage: Specify the schedule in Cron format, see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cron
parameters.name: schedule

parameters.usage: Specify deadline in seconds for starting the job if it misses scheduled
parameters.name: startingDeadlineSeconds

parameters.usage: suspend subsequent executions
parameters.name: suspend

parameters.usage: Specifies how to treat concurrent executions of a Job
parameters.name: concurrencyPolicy

parameters.usage: The number of successful finished jobs to retain
parameters.name: successfulJobsHistoryLimit

parameters.usage: The number of failed finished jobs to retain
parameters.name: failedJobsHistoryLimit

parameters.usage: Specify number of tasks to run in parallel
parameters.name: count

parameters.usage: Which image would you like to use for your service
parameters.name: image

parameters.usage: Specify image pull policy for your service
parameters.name: imagePullPolicy

parameters.usage: Specify image pull secrets for your service
parameters.name: imagePullSecrets

parameters.usage: Define the job restart policy, the value can only be Never or OnFailure. By default, it's Never.
parameters.name: restart

parameters.usage: Commands to run in the container
parameters.name: cmd

parameters.usage: Define arguments by using environment variables
parameters.name: env

parameters.usage: Number of CPU units for the service, like `0.5` (0.5 CPU core), `1` (1 CPU core)
parameters.name: cpu

parameters.usage: Specifies the attributes of the memory resource required for the container.
parameters.name: memory

parameters.usage: Declare volumes and volumeMounts
parameters.name: volumes

parameters.usage: An optional list of hosts and IPs that will be injected into the pod's hosts file
parameters.name: hostAliases

parameters.usage: Limits the lifetime of a Job that has finished
parameters.name: ttlSecondsAfterFinished

parameters.usage: The duration in seconds relative to the startTime that the job may be continuously active before the system tries to terminate it
parameters.name: activeDeadlineSeconds

parameters.usage: The number of retries before marking this job failed
parameters.name: backoffLimit

parameters.usage: Instructions for assessing whether the container is alive.
parameters.name: livenessProbe

parameters.usage: Instructions for assessing whether the container is in a suitable state to serve traffic.
parameters.name: readinessProbe
